name: Dead Eye (Meadows Games)
overview: Dead Eye is a shooting game for up to four players in hot seat. The player tosses a coin into the air and controls a figure at the bottom of the screen which can be moved left and right and made to fire its gun. The aim is to keep the coin in the air and hit the spinning wheels at the corners of the screen. Once the coin hits the floor the turn is over. There are also random small birds and buzzards flying by for additional points.
